hipi.imagebundle
Class HipiImageBundle

java.lang.Object
  hipi.imagebundle.AbstractImageBundle
      hipi.imagebundle.HipiImageBundle

public class HipiImageBundle
extends AbstractImageBundle

HipiImageBundle is HIPI's main way of storing collections of images. It takes advantage of the fact that Hadoop's MapReduce works best with data locality and large files as opposed to small files. This class provides methods for easily writing and reading to/from a HipiImageBundle. HipiImageBundles are broken up into an index file containing image offsets and a data file. The full implementation can be found at HIPI's main website.

See Also:
HIPI Project Homepage

Nested Class Summary
static class HipiImageBundle.FileReader
          The reader class provides a simple interface for reading images from a HipiImageBundle so that the HipiImageBundle can be split into multiple sections and be read in parallel.

append
